spells.tooltip: Yone strikes all enemies along a path for <physicalDamage>{{ tooltipdamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and <magicDamage>{{ tooltipdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, teleporting behind the last champion hit and <status>Knocking Up</status> victims towards Yone.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Shepherd of Souls
spells.description: <font color='#FF9900'>The Cursed Horde:</font> Yorick can summon Mist Walkers to swarm and attack nearby enemies.

spells.name: Last Rites
spells.description: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.
spells.tooltip:
Yorick's next Attack deals an additional {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and restores {{ qheal }} Health, or {{ empoweredqheal }} Health if Yorick is below 50% Health. If this Attack kills the target, it leaves a grave.

When there are 3 or more graves nearby and this Ability has already been used, Yorick can Recast to raise Mist Walkers from all nearby graves.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Dark Procession
spells.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
spells.tooltip: Yorick summons a wall of spirits blocking enemies' path, but not allies'. The wall can be Attacked, and disappears after {{ e5 }} hits.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Mourning Mist
spells.description: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that deals {{ e7 }}% current Health magic damage (min: {{ minimumdamagebonus }}), Slows by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds, and marks champions and monsters for {{ e2 }} seconds. Marked enemies continuously Awaken nearby graves (but not exceeding the maximum of {{ spell.yorickpassive:yorickpassiveghoulmax }}), and take {{ ghoulbonusdamage*100 }}% increased damage from up to {{ ghoulbonuscount }} attacks by Mist Walkers.

Yorick and his summoned units gain {{ e5 }}% Move Speed toward the mark. Mist Walkers will leap once at marked enemies that get away from them.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Eulogy of the Isles
spells.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist and {{ rghoulnumbers }} Mist Walkers. The Maiden has {{ yorickbigghoulhealth }} Health, deals {{ yorickbigghouldamage }} magic damage, and raises Mist Walkers from nearby enemy deaths.

When Yorick damages the Maiden's target, he will deal {{ rmarkdamagepercent }}% max Health magic damage. This effect has a {{ rproccd }} second Cooldown.

After 10 seconds, Yorick can Recast this Ability to free the Maiden, sending her down the nearest lane.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

ally: You do not need to cast Awakening to regain the ability to cast Last Rites.
The Maiden will attempt to assist you in a fight, so choose your targets well.
You can send the Maiden down a lane alone, be careful though, as she represents a large portion of your combat power.
enemy: You can cast Smite on Mist Walkers and the Maiden of the Mist to damage or kill them.
Try to thin out Yorick's minions before you engage him, Mist Walkers will die from a basic attack or a single target spell.
You can attack Dark Procession to break the wall down.

spells.name: Bop 'n' Block
spells.description: Periodically, when Yuumi attacks a champion, she restores mana and gains a shield that follows her, protecting her and the ally she's attached to.

spells.name: Prowling Projectile
spells.description:
Yuumi fires a missile, dealing damage to the first target hit. It deals bonus damage and slows if it takes at least 1 second to get to its target.

While Attached, the missile can be controlled with your cursor.
spells.tooltip:
Yuumi summons an errant missile that deals {{ totalmissiledamage }} magic damage to the first enemy hit. If the missile travels for {{ afterburnertimetooltip }} second before impacting, it deals {{ empoweredmissiledamage }} plus {{ currenthealthdamage*100 }}% current Health magic damage instead and Slows champions by {{ slowamount }}% for {{ slowduration }} second.

If cast while Attached, Yuumi can control the missile using her mouse.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: You and Me!
spells.description: Passively, Yuumi increases her ally's Adaptive Force and her own. Actively, Yuumi dashes to a target ally, becoming untargetable from everything except turrets.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Yuumi increases her Attached ally's Adaptive Force by {{ flatadaptivestats }} + {{ adaptivestatsharing*100 }}%, and grants herself the same amount.

Active: Yuumi dashes to an ally champion and Attaches to them. While Yuumi is Attached, she follows her partner's movement and is Untargetable except from towers.

Immobilizing effects on Yuumi place this Ability on a {{ ccattachlockout }} second Cooldown.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Zoomies
spells.description: Heals Yuumi and boosts Move Speed and Attack Speed. If she's attached, she passes it to her ally instead.
spells.tooltip: Yuumi restores <healing>{{ totalhealing }} Health</healing> to herself and gains <speed>{{ finalmovespeed }}% Move Speed</speed> and <attackSpeed>{{ attackspeedamount*100 }}% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for {{ msduration }} seconds. If Yuumi is <keywordMajor>Attached</keywordMajor>, this Ability affects her ally instead.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Final Chapter
spells.description: Yuumi channels seven waves of damage, rooting anyone hit by three or more. Yuumi can move, attach, and cast Zoomies! while channeling.
spells.tooltip:
Yuumi channels for {{ ultduration }} seconds, launching {{ numberofwaves }} waves dealing {{ totalmissiledamage }} magic damage. Champions hit by {{ wavestoroot }} waves are Rooted for {{ ccduration }} seconds.

Yuumi can move and cast You and Me! and Zoomies while channeling.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Cell Division
spells.description: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

spells.name: Stretching Strikes
spells.description: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.
spells.tooltip:
Zac stretches his arm out, attaching it to the first enemy hit to deal {{ damagetooltip }} magic damage and briefly Slow them. Zac's next Attack gains increased range and applies the same damage and Slow.

If Zac hits a different enemy with this Attack, he Knocks Up both towards each other. If they collide, they and surrounding enemies take {{ damagetooltip }} magic damage and are briefly Slowed.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Unstable Matter
spells.description: Zac explodes outward towards nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Zac's body erupts, dealing {{ basedamage }} + {{ displaypercentdamage }} max Health magic damage to nearby enemies.

Absorbing Goo reduces this Ability's Cooldown by 1 second.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Elastic Slingshot
spells.description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
spells.tooltip:
Begin Charging: Zac pulls himself taut, charging up a dash over {{ e4 }} seconds.

Release: Zac launches himself and Knocks Up enemies where he lands for up to {{ maxstun }} second (based on charge time), dealing them {{ damage }} magic damage. Zac spawns an extra chunk of Goo for each enemy champion hit.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Let's Bounce!
spells.description: Zac bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Cell Division healing is increased to {{ passivehealingtotaltooltip }} Health per Goo chunk.

Active: Zac bounces {{ bounces }} times. The first bounce to hit each enemy Knocks them back and deals {{ damageperbounce }} magic damage. Subsequent bounces deal {{ damagepersubsequentbounce }} magic damage and Slow by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} second.

Zac gains up to {{ endingms*100 }}% Move Speed over time and can cast Unstable Matter while bouncing.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

ally: Picking up goo chunks is very important to staying alive.
When Cell Division is ready, try to die in a position that makes it difficult for the enemy team to kill your bloblets.
Charging Elastic Slingshot from the fog of war will give opponents less time to react.
enemy: Zac heals from the goo that separates from him. You can crush the goo pieces by stepping on them.
Kill all of Zac's bloblets when he splits apart to stop him from reforming.
Silences, stuns, roots and knockups will all interrupt Zac when he is charging Elastic Slingshot.

spells.name: Contempt for the Weak
spells.description: Zed's basic attacks against low health targets deals bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every few seconds against the same enemy champion.

spells.name: Razor Shuriken
spells.description:
Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens.

Each shuriken deals damage to every enemy hit.
spells.tooltip: Zed and his <keywordMajor>Shadows</keywordMajor> throw their shurikens, each dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy they pass through, and <physicalDamage>{{ passthroughdamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to each additional enemy.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Living Shadow
spells.description:
Passive: Zed gains energy whenever he and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.

Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for a few seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Zed gains {{ e3 }} Energy whenever he and his Shadows strike an enemy with the same Ability.

Active: Zed's Shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for {{ e5 }} seconds. Recasting this Ability will cause Zed to switch positions with this Shadow.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Shadow Slash
spells.description: Zed and his shadows slash, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Zed and his Shadows slash, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to nearby enemies.

Each enemy champion hit by Zed's slash reduces Living Shadow's Cooldown by {{ shadowhitcdr }} seconds.

Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are Slowed by {{ movespeedmod*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but are Slowed by {{ movespeedmodbonus*-100 }}% instead.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Death Mark
spells.description: Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage Zed dealt to the target while they were marked.
spells.tooltip:
Zed becomes Untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After {{ rdeathmarkduration }} seconds, the mark triggers, dealing {{ rcalculateddamage }} physical damage and repeating {{ rdamageamp*100 }}% of all damage dealt to the target by Zed while the mark was active.

The dash leaves a Shadow behind for {{ rshadowdurationdisplayed }} seconds. Zed can Recast this Ability to switch positions with this Shadow.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

ally: Saving energy and spell cooldowns until you use your ultimate will maximize Death Mark's damage.
Quickly double tapping Living Shadow will teleport Zed to his shadow immediately for rapid escapes.
Placing a Living Shadow before using Death Mark can give Zed a safe escape from combat.
enemy: Zed receives bonus effect from Attack Damage items he purchases, so Armor is super effective against him.
After Zed uses his Living Shadow, he is at his most vulnerable as his damage, slow, and mobility are both dependent upon it.
Zed's Shadow Slash can only slow you if his shadow hits you with it.

spells.name: Living Battery
spells.description: Zeri gains Move Speed whenever she receives a shield. When she damages an enemy shield she absorbs its energy, shielding herself.

spells.name: Burst Fire
spells.description: Zeri's Attacks are treated as Abilities and Burst Fire is treated as an Attack. Moving and casting Burst Fire stores up energy in Zeri's Sparkpack. When fully charged her next Attack will slow and deal bonus damage. Burst Fire shoots a burst of 7 rounds that deal attack damage to the first enemy hit.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Zeri's Attacks are treated as Abilities and can be charged up by moving and casting this ability. Uncharged Attacks consume a small amount of charge, deal {{ mindamage }} magic damage and execute enemies below {{ passiveexecutethreshold }} Health. A fully charged Attack deals {{ passivemaxdamage }} + {{ passivemaxchargepercenthealth }} max Health magic damage and consumes all charge.

Active: This Ability is treated as an Attack. Zeri fires a burst of {{ numberofmissiles }} rounds that deals {{ activedamagethatcancrit }} physical damage to the first enemy hit.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Ultrashock Laser
spells.description: Zeri fires an electric pulse that slows and damages the first enemy hit. If the pulse hits a wall it expands into a long range laser.
spells.tooltip:
Zeri fires an electric pulse that deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Slows the first enemy hit by {{ slowpercent*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

If the pulse hits terrain, it expands into a laser that applies the effects in an area and Critically Strikes champions and monsters.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Spark Surge
spells.description: Zeri dashes a short distance and energizes her next 3 shots of Burst Fire, causing them to pierce through enemies. She will vault and grind over any terrain she touches.
spells.tooltip:
Zeri dashes a short distance and vaults over any terrain she touches, greatly extending the dash range. Her next 3 shots of Burst Fire pierce, dealing {{ pendamagepercent*100 }}% damage to enemies after the first.

Hitting an enemy champion with an Attack or Ability reduces this Ability's cooldown by {{ cdreductionperhit }} seconds. Critical strikes reduce the cooldown 2 additional times.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Lightning Crash
spells.description: Zeri discharges a nova of electricity and overcharges herself, gaining increased damage and stacking Move Speed that refreshes and gets stronger every time she hits an enemy champion. While overcharged, Burst fire becomes a faster triple shot that chains lightning between enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Zeri discharges a nova of electricity, dealing {{ totalactivedamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies and gaining {{ stacksperhit }} stacks of Overcharge for each champion hit for {{ rduration }} seconds. Each stack grants {{ mspercent*100 }}% Move Speed. Hitting an enemy champion with an Attack or Ability adds a stack of Overcharge and refreshes its duration by {{ durationincreaseperhit }} seconds. Critical strikes add 2 additional stacks.

While Overcharged Zeri also gains {{ baseaspercent*100 }}% Attack Speed and Burst Fire becomes a faster triple shot that deals an additional {{ totalbonusdamage }} magic damage and chains {{ totalbonusdamage }} magic damage + {{ chainphysicaldamage }} physical damage to nearby enemies.
{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Short Fuse
spells.description: Periodically, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

spells.name: Bouncing Bomb
spells.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
spells.tooltip: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Satchel Charge
spells.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
spells.tooltip:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after {{ e2 }} seconds, or when this ability is Recast. It deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to enemies and Knocks them Back. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Satchel Charge will automatically destroy towers below {{ f1*100 }}% of their Health.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Hexplosive Minefield
spells.description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing. Successive mine detonations on the same target deal reduced damage.
spells.tooltip: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slows</status> by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Mines last {{ e3 }} seconds.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
spells.description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.
spells.tooltip: Ziggs hurls his ultimate creation, dealing <magicDamage>{{ empowereddamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> in the center of the blast radius, or <magicDamage>{{ blastdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> at the edge.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

ally: Even if you're far from a fight you can still help from afar with Mega Inferno Bomb.
Slowing your enemies with Hexplosive Minefield makes it easier to land other abilities.
Knocking yourself over walls with Satchel Charge can be great when chasing after or escaping from enemies.
enemy: Don't step on Ziggs' mines! They'll slow you and make it much easier for him to hit you with his other abiltiies.
Many of Ziggs' abilities have long cooldowns. Try catching him just after he's used his abilities.
Ziggs' ultimate, Mega Inferno Bomb, deals more damage in the center of the explosion.

spells.name: Time In A Bottle
spells.description: Zilean stores time as Experience and can grant it to his allies. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level up, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives.

spells.name: Time Bomb
spells.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Zilean tosses a time-delayed bomb that sticks to the first unit which comes within a small area around it. After {{ e2 }} seconds it detonates, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

Placing a second bomb on a unit that already has one detonates the first bomb immediately and Stuns enemies in the blast for {{ e4 }} seconds.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Rewind
spells.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
spells.tooltip: Zilean turns time, reducing his other basic Ability Cooldowns by {{ e2 }} seconds.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Time Warp
spells.description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Move Speed or increasing an ally's Move Speed for a short time.
spells.tooltip: Zilean <status>Slows</status> an enemy champion by {{ e2 }}% or grants an allied champion <speed>{{ e2 }}% Move Speed</speed> for {{ e1 }} seconds.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Chronoshift
spells.description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.
spells.tooltip: Zilean grants a protective time rune to an allied champion for {{ rduration }} seconds. If the target would die, the rune rewinds their timeline, putting them into Stasis for {{ revivestateduration }} seconds, then reviving them and restoring <healing>{{ rtotalheal }} Health</healing>.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

ally: You can combine the use of Time Bomb and Rewind to place two Time Bombs on a target quickly. Placing the second bomb will detonate the first and stun all nearby enemies.
Time Warp is an effective way to enable allies to finish off enemies, or escape from a losing battle.
Chronoshift is a powerful deterrent to attacking your carries, but casting Chronoshift too early in a fight can cause the enemy to switch targets too soon, making it less effective.
enemy: If you're able to match Zilean's speed, it can sometimes be beneficial to wait until his ultimate has faded before landing the killing blow.
Zilean is fragile if a team focuses on him, but otherwise he's very difficult to kill. Commit to killing him as a team.

spells.name: More Sparkles!
spells.description: Zoe's next basic attack after casting a spell deals bonus magic damage.

spells.name: Paddle Star!
spells.description: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight. Deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.
spells.tooltip:
Zoe fires a star that deals increasing damage the further it travels to the first enemy hit -- between {{ totaldamagetooltip }} to {{ maxdamagetooltip }} magic damage. Enemies surrounding the target take {{ e4 }}% damage.

Zoe can Recast this Ability to redirect the missile to a new position near Zoe.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Spell Thief
spells.description: Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Enemies drop spell shards when casting a Summoner Spell or using an Active Item. Specific minions also drop a spell shard when Zoe kills them. Zoe can pick up this shard to cast that ability once.

Passive: When Zoe casts this Ability or any Summoner Spell, she gains {{ e9 }}% Move Speed for {{ e0 }} seconds and tosses 3 missiles at the target she Attacked most recently. These missiles deal {{ missiledamagetooltip }} magic damage each.

Active: Cast the Ability from a spell shard Zoe has picked up.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
spells.description: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.
spells.tooltip:
Zoe dropkicks a bubble that deals {{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage, lingering as a trap if it hits nothing. The bubble's range is extended when flying over terrain.

After a delay, the victim falls Asleep for 2 seconds. Attacks and Ability hits wake them up but deal double damage, up to {{ breakdamagetooltip }} true damage.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Portal Jump
spells.description: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.
spells.tooltip: Zoe teleports to a nearby position for 1 second. Afterwards, she teleports back. Zoe can use Abilities and Attack, but can't move during this time.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

ally: Paddle Star deals more damage the further it has flown. Casting it behind yourself before redirecting can deal tons of damage.
Break Sleep with your biggest damage source, since enemies who are asleep take double damage.
Sleepy Trouble Bubble travels further over walls. Find a hiding spot to set up for a long distance kill.
enemy: Zoe's Paddle Star deals more damage the further it has flown.
Zoe must return to her starting point after casting Portal Jump, making her vulnerable to a counterattack.
Sleepy Trouble Bubble travels further over walls. Stop Zoe from hiding in fog of war to prevent her from setting the spell up.

spells.name: Garden of Thorns
spells.description: Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level. Zyra can cast Deadly Spines or Grasping Roots near seeds to grow plants, who fight for Zyra.

spells.name: Deadly Spines
spells.description: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.
spells.tooltip:
Zyra causes thick vines to spread and explode into spines, dealing {{ initialdamage }} magic damage.

If this Ability is cast near a Seed, the Seed grows into a Thorn Spitter that deals {{ spell.zyrap:plantdamage }} magic damage and lasts {{ f2 }} seconds. Thorn Spitters have 575 range.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Rampant Growth
spells.description: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.
spells.tooltip:
Zyra plants a Seed that lasts {{ e6 }} seconds. These Seeds grant True Sight of enemy champions that step on them for {{ e3 }} seconds, but are still destroyed.

This Ability has 2 charges with a {{ ammorechargetime }} second recharge time. Killing an enemy reduces the recharge time by {{ e1 }}%. Champion takedowns, large jungle monster kills, and large minion kills reduce the recharge time by {{ e2 }}% instead.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Grasping Roots
spells.description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Move Speed.
spells.tooltip:
Zyra sends vines forward, Rooting for {{ e5 }} second(s) and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

If this Ability passes near a Seed, the Seed grows into a Vine Lasher that deals {{ spell.zyrap:plantdamage }} magic damage and lasts {{ f2 }} seconds. Vine Lashers have 400 range, and their Attacks Slow by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. The Slow from multiple Vine Lashers stacks up to {{ maxslowstacks }} times.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Stranglethorns
spells.description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts. Plants within the thicket are enraged.
spells.tooltip:
Zyra summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket that deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. After 2 seconds, the vines snap upwards, Knocking Up for {{ e1 }} second.

Zyra's plants within the thicket become enraged, resetting their duration, gaining {{ e2 }}% Health and Attacking for {{ plantdamagebonus }}% bonus damage.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

ally: Placing a seed in your spell's path after you have cast it gives you the best chance of having a seed in the proper spot.
Seeds grant vision to your team.
Zyra is a great ambusher - look for opportunities to set a trap of seeds in brush, then lure enemies in.
enemy: Zyra's seeds can be destroyed by stepping on them. If she tries to grow them as you do, dodge back at the last moment.
Moving closer to Zyra can be a smart move if she places plants too far away from herself.
Plants take fixed damage from attacks and effects, similar to wards. They also expire quickly on their own.
Moving the fight to a different area will deprive Zyra of accumulated seeds.
Seeds placed by Zyra's W are larger, a different color, and grant a small amount of vision to her team.

SummonerBarrier.name: Barrier
SummonerBarrier.description: Shields your champion from 105-411 damage (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.
SummonerBarrier.tooltip: Temporarily shields {{ tooltipabsorbeddamage }} damage from your champion for 2 seconds.

SummonerBoost.name: Cleanse
SummonerBoost.description: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.
SummonerBoost.tooltip: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and reduces the duration of disables by 65% for the next {{ e2 }} seconds.

SummonerDot.name: Ignite
SummonerDot.description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.
SummonerDot.tooltip:
Ignite deals {{ tooltiptruedamagecalculation }} true damage to target enemy champion over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target and applies {{ grievousamount*100 }}% Grievous Wounds for the duration.

(Grievous Wounds reduces healing and regeneration by a percentage equal to the highest value applied. This vision does not reveal stealthed enemies.)

SummonerExhaust.name: Exhaust
SummonerExhaust.description: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Move Speed by 30%, and their damage dealt by 35% for 3 seconds.
SummonerExhaust.tooltip: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Move Speed by {{ e5 }}%, and their damage dealt by {{ damagereductiontooltip }}% for 3 seconds.

SummonerFlash.name: Flash
SummonerFlash.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
SummonerFlash.tooltip: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

SummonerHaste.name: Ghost
SummonerHaste.description: For 10 seconds, your champion can move through units and gains 24 - 48% Move Speed (depending on champion level). Ghost extends its duration on takedown.
SummonerHaste.tooltip:
For {{ duration }} seconds, your champion can move through units and gains {{ movespeedmod }} Move Speed.

Ghost extends its duration by {{ takedownextension }} seconds on takedown.

SummonerHeal.name: Heal
SummonerHeal.description: Restores 80-318 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Move Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.
SummonerHeal.tooltip:
Restores {{ tooltiphealamount }} Health and grants 30% Move Speed for 1 second to your champion and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.

If this spell cannot find a target, it will cast on the most wounded allied champion in range.

SummonerMana.name: Clarity
SummonerMana.description: Restores 50% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 25% of their maximum Mana.
SummonerMana.tooltip: Restores {{ e1 }}% maximum Mana to your Champion and {{ e2 }}% to nearby allies.

SummonerPoroRecall.name: To the King!
SummonerPoroRecall.description: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.
SummonerPoroRecall.tooltip:
Passive: Hitting an enemy champion with a Poro gives your team a Poro Mark. Upon reaching 10 Poro Marks, your team summons the Poro King to fight alongside them. While the Poro King is active, no Poro Marks can be scored by either team.

Active: Quickly dash to King Poro's side. Can only be cast while the Poro King is summoned for your team.

''Poros tug the heartstrings. The rest of you just comes along for the ride.''

SummonerPoroThrow.name: Poro Toss
SummonerPoroThrow.description: Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.
SummonerPoroThrow.tooltip:
Toss a Poro a long distance, dealing {{ f2 }} true damage to the first enemy unit hit, granting True Sight of the target.

This ability can be recast for 3 seconds if it hits an enemy to dash to the target hit, dealing {{ f2 }} more true damage and reducing the cooldown of the next Poro Toss by {{ e4 }} seconds.

Poros are not blocked by spell shields or wind walls because they are animals, not spells!

''Poros are a model for Runeterran aerodynamics.''

SummonerSmite.name: Smite
SummonerSmite.description: Deals 450 true damage to target epic, large, or medium monster or minion. Against monsters, additionally restores 90 (+10% maximum Health) Health. Holds two charges (90s Recharge Time)
SummonerSmite.tooltip:
Deals {{ smitebasedamage }} true damage to target monster or minion. Against monsters, additionally restores {{ smitebaseheal }} (+{{ tooltipsmitehealaddition }}) Health.

Smite regains a charge every {{ ammorechargetime }} seconds, up to a maximum of 2 charges.

Cannot be cast on small monsters.

SummonerSnowURFSnowball_Mark.name: Mark
SummonerSnowURFSnowball_Mark.description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
SummonerSnowURFSnowball_Mark.tooltip:
Throw a snowball a long distance, dealing {{ tooltipdamagetotal }} true damage to the first enemy unit hit and granting True Sight of the target. If it hits an enemy, this ability can be recast for {{ e3 }} seconds to Dash to the tagged unit, dealing an additional {{ tooltipdamagetotal }} true damage. Dashing to the target will reduce the cooldown of Mark by {{ e4 }}%.

Mark projectiles are not stopped by spell shields or projectile mitigation.

SummonerSnowball.name: Mark
SummonerSnowball.description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
SummonerSnowball.tooltip:
Throw a snowball a long distance, dealing {{ tooltipdamagetotal }} true damage to the first enemy unit hit and granting True Sight of the target. If it hits an enemy, this ability can be recast for {{ e3 }} seconds to Dash to the tagged unit, dealing an additional {{ tooltipdamagetotal }} true damage. Dashing to the target will reduce the cooldown of Mark by {{ e4 }}%.

Mark projectiles are not stopped by spell shields or projectile mitigation.

SummonerTeleport.name: Teleport
SummonerTeleport.description: After channeling for 4 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied structure. Upgrades to Unleashed Teleport at 14 minutes, which teleports your champion to target allied structure, minion, or ward.
SummonerTeleport.tooltip:
After channeling for {{ channelduration }} seconds, your champion teleports to target allied structure.

Upgrades to Unleashed Teleport when Turret Plates fall at 14 minutes. Unleashed Teleport has a {{ upgradedcooldown }}s cooldown, can be used on allied structures, minions, or wards, and grants a {{ msamount*100 }}% Move Speed boost for {{ msduration }} seconds.

Summoner_UltBookPlaceholder.name: Placeholder
Summoner_UltBookPlaceholder.description: This slot will be replaced by another champion's ultimate selected at the start of the game. There will be 30 seconds to select an ultimate. Be prepared!
Summoner_UltBookPlaceholder.tooltip: Will be replaced by your Ultimate Summoner Spell selection.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

Summoner_UltBookSmitePlaceholder.name: Placeholder and Attack-Smite
Summoner_UltBookSmitePlaceholder.description: This slot will be replaced by another champion's ultimate and you will gain Attack-Smite. There will be 30 seconds to select an ultimate. Be prepared!
Summoner_UltBookSmitePlaceholder.tooltip:
Will be replaced by your Ultimate Summoner Spell.

Gain Attack-Smite. Attack-Smite will execute allied Buff Monsters, Epic Monsters, and Scuttle Crabs when you attack them.

Attack-Smite does not have a cooldown.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

runes.name: Electrocute
runes.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
runes.longDesc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

runes.name: Predator
runes.shortDesc: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
Enchants your boots with the active effect 'Predator.'

Gain increased Move Speed, ramping up to 25-50% Move Speed over 1 second, while chasing enemy champions. After ramping up, damaging attacks or abilities to champions end this effect, dealing 20-180 (+0.25 bonus AD)(+0.15 AP) bonus adaptive damage.

Cooldown: 120s-60s.

runes.name: Dark Harvest
runes.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

runes.name: Hail of Blades
runes.shortDesc: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 110% Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 12s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

runes.name: Cheap Shot
runes.shortDesc: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct'>impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging champions with impaired movement or actions deals 10 - 45 bonus true damage (based on level).

Cooldown: 4s
Activates on damage occurring after the impairment.

runes.name: Taste of Blood
runes.shortDesc: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.
runes.longDesc:
Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

Healing: 16-30 (+0.15 bonus AD, +0.08 AP) health (based on level)

Cooldown: 20s

runes.name: Sudden Impact
runes.shortDesc: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.
runes.longDesc:
After exiting stealth or using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport, dealing any damage to a champion grants you 9 Lethality and 7 Magic Penetration for 5s.

Cooldown: 4s

runes.name: Zombie Ward
runes.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Zombie Ward spawned plus bonus upon completion.
runes.longDesc:
Takedowns on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Zombie Ward spawned, up to 10.

After spawning 10 Zombie Wards, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.

Zombie Wards are visible, last for 120s and do not count towards your ward limit.

runes.name: Ghost Poro
runes.shortDesc: When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro. The Ghost Poro grants vision until discovered. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Ghost Poro and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion, plus bonus upon completion.
runes.longDesc:
When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro, which grants vision for 90s. Nearby enemy champions scare the Ghost Poro away.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Ghost Poro spawned and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion up to 10 stacks.

After gaining 10 stacks, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.

runes.name: Eyeball Collection
runes.shortDesc: Collect eyeballs for champion <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.
runes.longDesc:
Collect eyeballs for champion takedowns. Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power, per eyeball collected.

Upon completing your collection at 10 eyeballs, additionally gain an adaptive bonus of 6 Attack Damage, or 10 Ability Power.

Collect 1 eyeball per champion takedown.

runes.name: Treasure Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant additional gold the first time they are collected.
runes.longDesc:
Gain an additional 70 gold the next time you collect a Bounty Hunter stack. Increase the gold gained by 20 gold for each Bounty Hunter stack, up to 150 gold.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

runes.name: Ingenious Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent Item Haste (includes Trinkets).
runes.longDesc:
Gain 20 Item Haste plus an additional 6 Item Haste per Bounty Hunter stack (includes Trinkets).

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

Item Haste affects all items with cooldowns.

runes.name: Relentless Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent out of combat MS.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 5 Move Speed out of combat plus 8 per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

runes.name: Ultimate Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.
runes.longDesc:
Your ultimate gains 6 Ability Haste, plus an additional 5 Ability Haste per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

runes.name: Glacial Augment
runes.shortDesc: Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays that slow nearby enemies and reduce their damage to your allies.
runes.longDesc:
Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays to emanate from them towards you and other nearby champions, creating frozen zones for 3 (+ 100% of the immobilizing effect's duration) seconds that slow enemies for 30% (+9% per 10% Heal and Shield Power) (+3% per 100 Ability Power) (+4% per 100 bonus Attack Damage) and reduce their damage by 15% against your allies (not including yourself).

Cooldown: 25s

runes.name: Unsealed Spellbook
runes.shortDesc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
runes.longDesc:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 25s (initial swap cooldown is at 5 mins).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.
Smite damage increases after two Summoner Spell swaps.

runes.name: First Strike
runes.shortDesc: When you initiate champion combat, deal 9% extra damage for 3 seconds and gain gold based on damage dealt.
runes.longDesc:
Attacks or abilities against an enemy champion within 0.25s of entering champion combat grants 5 gold and First Strike for 3 seconds, causing you to deal 9% extra damage against champions, and granting 100% (70% for ranged champions) of bonus damage dealt as gold.

Cooldown: 25 - 15s

runes.name: Hextech Flashtraption
runes.shortDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.
runes.longDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel for 2s to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: 20s. Goes on a 10s cooldown when you enter champion combat.

runes.name: Magical Footwear
runes.shortDesc: You get free boots at 12 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedown</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> you get makes your boots come 45s sooner.
runes.longDesc:
You get free Slightly Magical Footwear at 12 min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots 45s sooner.

Slightly Magical Footwear grants you an additional 10 Move Speed.

runes.name: Perfect Timing
runes.shortDesc:
Gain a free Commencing Stopwatch. After 14 minutes, it can be used for a one time Stasis effect.

Each takedown you get shortens this timer by 120 seconds.
runes.longDesc:
Begin the game with a Commencing Stopwatch that transforms into a Stopwatch after 14 minutes. Each takedown you acquire reduces this timer by 120 seconds.

Stopwatch can be used for a one time 2.5 second Stasis effect.

runes.name: Future's Market
runes.shortDesc: You can enter debt to buy items.
runes.longDesc:
You can enter debt to buy items. The amount you can borrow increases over time.

Lending Fee: 50 gold

runes.name: Minion Dematerializer
runes.shortDesc: Start the game with 3 Minion Dematerializers. Killing minions with the item gives permanent bonus damage vs. that minion type.
runes.longDesc:
Start the game with 3 Minion Dematerializers that kill and absorb lane minions instantly. Minion Dematerializers are on cooldown for the first 180s of the game.

Absorbing a minion increases your damage by +6% against that type of minion permanently, and an extra +3% for each additional minion of that type absorbed.

runes.name: Biscuit Delivery
runes.shortDesc: Gain a free Biscuit every 2 min, until 6 min. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max mana and restores health and mana.
runes.longDesc:
Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will every 2 mins, until 6 min.

Biscuits restore 8% of your missing health and mana. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your mana cap by 40.

Manaless: Champions without mana restore 12% missing health instead.

runes.name: Cosmic Insight
runes.shortDesc:
+18 Summoner Spell Haste
+10 Item Haste
runes.longDesc:
+18 Summoner Spell Haste
+10 Item Haste

runes.name: Approach Velocity
runes.shortDesc: Bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> towards nearby enemy champions that are <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>movement impaired</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>, increased for enemy champions that you impair.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 7.5% Move Speed towards nearby enemy champions that are movement impaired. This bonus is increased to 15% Move Speed for any enemy champion that you impair.

Activation Range for CC from allies: 1000

runes.name: Time Warp Tonic
runes.shortDesc: Potions and biscuits grant some restoration immediately. Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>  while under their effects.
runes.longDesc: Consuming a potion or biscuit grants 30% of its health or mana restoration immediately. In addition, gain 2% Move Speed while under their effects.

runes.name: Press the Attack
runes.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times makes them vulnerable, dealing bonus damage and causing them to take more damage from all sources for 6s.
runes.longDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 consecutive basic attacks deals 40 - 180 bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> (based on level) and makes them vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 8 - 12% from all sources for 6s.

runes.name: Lethal Tempo
runes.shortDesc: Gain Attack Speed when attacking an enemy champion, stacking up to 6 times. At max stacks, gain Attack Range and remove your Attack Speed limit.
runes.longDesc:
Gain [60% - 90%] (Melee) or [30% - 54%] (Ranged) Attack Speed for 6 seconds when you attack an enemy champion. This effect stacks up to 6 times.

While this effect fully stacked, your Attack Speed can exceed 2.5 and you gain 50 (Melee) or 75 (Ranged) Attack Range.

runes.name: Fleet Footwork
runes.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 10 - 100 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.2 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 10% effective for Ranged Champions, and 20% effective for Melee Champions.

runes.name: Conqueror
runes.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
runes.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 5s, gaining 2-4.5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 8% of the damage you deal to champions (5% for ranged champions).

runes.name: Overheal
runes.shortDesc: Excess healing on you becomes a shield.
runes.longDesc:
Excess healing on you becomes a shield, for up to 10 (+9% Max Health).

Shield is built up from 20 to 100% of excess healing from yourself or any ally.

runes.name: Triumph
runes.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore 10% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.
runes.longDesc:
Takedowns restore 10% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.


'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.'
Noxian Reckoner

runes.name: Presence of Mind
runes.shortDesc: Increase your mana or energy regeneration when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging an enemy champion increases your mana regeneration by @RegenAmount@ (80% for ranged) mana per second for 4 seconds. All energy users gain 1.5 energy per second, instead.

Takedowns restore 15% of your maximum mana or energy.

runes.name: Legend: Alacrity
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Attack Speed.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 3% attack speed plus an additional 1.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Legend: Tenacity
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Tenacity.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 5% tenacity plus an additional 2.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Legend: Bloodline
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Life Steal, up to a cap. Once the cap is reached, increase your max health. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 0.4% Life Steal for every Legend stack (max 15 stacks). At maximum Legend stacks, gain 100 max health.

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Coup de Grace
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.
runes.longDesc: Deal 8% more damage to champions who have less than 40% health.

runes.name: Cut Down
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to champions with more max health than you.
runes.longDesc:
Deal 5% to 15% more damage to champions, based on how much more max health they have than you.

Bonus damage scales up linearly against enemies with 10% to 100% more max health than you.

runes.name: Last Stand
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.
runes.longDesc: Deal 5% - 11% increased damage to champions while you are below 60% health. Max damage gained at 30% health.

runes.name: Grasp of the Undying
runes.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
runes.longDesc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 3.5% of your max health
  • Heals you for 1.7% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

runes.name: Aftershock
runes.shortDesc: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.
runes.longDesc:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 35 + 80% of your Bonus Resists for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 25 - 120 (+8% of your bonus health)
Cooldown: 20s

Resistance bonus from Aftershock capped at: 80-150 (based on level)

runes.name: Guardian
runes.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
runes.longDesc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 90 - 40 seconds
Shield: 45 - 120 + 12.5% of your ability power + 8% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

runes.name: Demolish
runes.shortDesc: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.
runes.longDesc:
Charge up a powerful attack against a tower over 3s, while within 600 range of it. The charged attack deals 100 (+35% of your max health) bonus physical damage.

Cooldown: 45s

runes.name: Font of Life
runes.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion marks them. Your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.
runes.longDesc:
Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for 4s.

Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for 5 + 0.9% of your max health over 2s.

runes.name: Shield Bash
runes.shortDesc: Whenever you gain a shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> damage.
runes.longDesc:
While shielded, gain 1 - 10 Armor and Magic Resist based on Level.

Whenever you gain a new shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals 5 - 30 (+1.5% Bonus Health) (+8.5% New Shield Amount) bonus adaptive damage.

You have up to 2s after the shield expires to use this effect.

runes.name: Conditioning
runes.shortDesc: After 12 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 3%.
runes.longDesc: After 12 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 3%.

runes.name: Second Wind
runes.shortDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.
runes.longDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for 4% of your missing health +3 over 10s.

runes.name: Bone Plating
runes.shortDesc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 55s
runes.longDesc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 55s

runes.name: Overgrowth
runes.shortDesc: Gain permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.
runes.longDesc:
Absorb life essence from monsters or enemy minions that die near you, permanently gaining 3 maximum health for every 8.

When you've absorbed 120 monsters or enemy minions, gain an additional 3.5% maximum health.

runes.name: Revitalize
runes.shortDesc:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.

runes.name: Unflinching
runes.shortDesc: Gain a small amount of tenacity that increases with missing health.
runes.longDesc: Gain 5% Tenacity and 5% Slow Resist. These values increase by up to an additional 20% Tenacity and 20% Slow Resist based on missing health. Maximum value achieved at 30% health.

runes.name: Summon Aery
runes.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 40 based on level (+0.1 AP) (+0.15 bonus AD).

Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 30 - 75 based on level (+0.22 AP) (+0.35 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

runes.name: Arcane Comet
runes.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

runes.name: Phase Rush
runes.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
runes.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 15 - 40% Move Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.
This is increased to 30 - 60% Move Speed for Melee champions.
Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 30s - 10s

runes.name: Nullifying Orb
runes.shortDesc: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.
runes.longDesc:
When you take magic damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a shield that absorbs 35 - 110 magic damage based on level (+0.09 AP and +0.14 bonus AD) for 4s.

Cooldown: 60s

runes.name: Manaflow Band
runes.shortDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.
runes.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

Cooldown: 15 seconds

runes.name: Nimbus Cloak
runes.shortDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a short <speed>Move Speed</speed> increase that allows you to pass through units.
runes.longDesc:
After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a Move Speed increase that lasts for 2s and allows you to pass through units.

Increase: 5% - 25% Move Speed based on the Summoner Spell's cooldown. (Higher cooldown Summoner Spells grant more Move Speed).

runes.name: Transcendence
runes.shortDesc:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.
runes.longDesc:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.

runes.name: Celerity
runes.shortDesc: All <speed>Move Speed</speed> bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.
runes.longDesc: All movement bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.

runes.name: Absolute Focus
runes.shortDesc: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
While above 70% health, gain an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level).

Grants 1.8 Attack Damage or 3 Ability Power at level 1.

runes.name: Scorch
runes.shortDesc: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.
runes.longDesc:
Your next damaging ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 20 - 40 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.

Cooldown: 10s

runes.name: Waterwalking
runes.shortDesc: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 25 Move Speed and an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level) when in the river.


May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.

runes.name: Gathering Storm
runes.shortDesc: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.
runes.longDesc:
Every 10 min gain AP or AD, adaptive.

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...

1035.name: Emberknife
1035.description:
• Sear: Damaging Monsters burns them over time.
  • Challenging Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Smite to Challenging Smite and increases its damage to monsters. Challenging Smite marks champions. During this time, you deal bonus true damage to them on hit and take reduced damage from them.
  • Huntsman: Killing Large Monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen mana when in the Jungle or River.

    Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.

    Only attacks and abilities apply Challenging Smite's burn

  • Chilling Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Smite to Chilling Smite and increases its damage to monsters. When smiting champions Chilling Smite deals true damage and steals their Move Speed.
  • Huntsman: Killing Large Monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen mana when in the Jungle or River.

    Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.

If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. All proceeds will be donated towards fighting Noxian animal cruelty.

Refuel: Moving and taking damage from Champions and large monsters fills up the Chemtank. At 100 stacks, your next basic attack deals damage to all nearby enemies (increased against minions and monsters).

insights.value: Enemies who dash or blink near Vex are marked with Gloom, causing Vex's next auto or basic ability to consume the mark to deal bonus damage and refund 25% of @spell_P@'s cooldown.
Triggering @spell_P@ knocks down the affected enemy.
@spell_E@ increases in size the farther it travels.
If @spell_R@'s target dies within 6 seconds of being marked by it, Vex can cast @spell_R@ again for free for the next 12 seconds.
@spell_R@ grants vision of where it travels and grants true sight of its target.

strengths.value: Has strong poking potential and can protect herself when enemies reach her with @spell_P@ / @spell_W@.
Can constantly lower @spell_P@'s cooldown by consuming marks on dashing and blinking enemies as well as landing @spell_E@.
Excels at bursting enemies, interrupting engages, and has the potential to "pop off" in teamfights with @spell_R@'s reset mechanic.
Synergizes well with @item_6655@, @item_3157@, @item_3089@, @item_4628@, @item_4645@, and @item_3135@. Can opt for @item_4644@ or @item_6656@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: All of Vex's skillshots are slow and telegraphed.
Is naturally weaker when @spell_P@ is on cooldown.
Once she enters a fight by recasting @spell_R@, there's no way out.

insights.value: On cast, @spell_Q@ cleanses Garen of ALL slows.
@spell_Q@ resets Garen's auto attack.
When @spell_W@'s passive is fully stacked, Garen gains 10% bonus Armor and MR.
@spell_W@ only grants a shield and 60% Tenacity for the first 0.75 seconds of the cast.
If an enemy is hit 6 times by @spell_E@, their armor is reduced by 25%.
@spell_E@ deals 25% bonus damage to the nearest enemy.

strengths.value: Excels at melee matchups and extended trades.
At level 6, he can 100-0 with @spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_6631@, @item_3071@, @item_3053@, @item_3742@, and @item_4401@. Can opt for @item_3078@, @item_6632@, or @item_6692@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Can be kited very easily by mobile champions or ones who outrange him.
Less effective in teamfights and has trouble entering them.
@spell_Q@ only cleanses slows on cast. Spammable slows from abilities and items will keep him at bay.

insights.value: Shen can be interrupted when casting @spell_R@. Use any hard CC to prevent him from teleporting.
Don't position between him and his blade. If his @spell_Q@ collides with enemies while traveling, Q will do extra damage and the enemies will also get slowed if they move away from him.
Every time he hits a champ, the CD of his @spell_P@ decreases, allowing him to get multiple shields when dueling.

strengths.value: Lvl 2 is deceptively strong if he lands @spell_E@ on you and casts the 3 @spell_Q@ autos!
Lvl 6 gives him the access to impact other lanes. Try and keep him shoved in so he misses CS if he @spell_R@ away.

weaknesses.value: If he misses @spell_E@ but still uses @spell_Q@, he'll have used up a lot of energy. Abuse that window to fight.
In lane, the best time to trade is when his shield is down. If he uses @spell_Q@ on minions, force a trade as he won't have his shield or empowered autos.

insights.value: @spell_Q@ reveals struck champions.
@spell_Q@'s will continue granting Akshan bonus movespeed as long as it keeps hitting champions.
@spell_W@ lasts indefinitely while Akshan is near terrain or inside brush.
@spell_E@'s cooldown resets on Takedowns.
@spell_R@ can be cast again to end prematurely and fire less shots.

strengths.value: Has very high mobility.
Reviving allies with @spell_W@ can swing extended fights and singlehandedly win games.
Excels in open areas where @spell_R@ cannot be blocked by other units and near terrain corners where @spell_E@ can be used freely.
Synergizes well with @item_6672@, @item_3508@, @item_3031@, @item_3091@, and @item_3036@. Can opt for @item_6673@, @item_3078@, or @item_6671@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Very reliant on gold and levels.
@spell_W@'s enemy trails, bonus movespeed, and bonus mana regen are only granted while hunting Scoundrels.
Has consistently low damage output in fights until @spell_E@ can be safely used.
@spell_R@ can be blocked by any non-friendly unit in the game, including minions, monsters, and turrets.

insights.value: @spell_Q@ resets Bel'Veth's auto attack.
When @spell_W@ hits an enemy champion, @spell_Q@'s cooldown resets in the direction they were hit.
@spell_E@ applies on-hit effects, but at a reduced amount.
@spell_R@'s passive infinitely stacks while attacking the same target.

strengths.value: Scales incredibly well as she earns Takedowns through @spell_P@'s infinitely scaling Attack Speed.
Can consistently chase down enemies with well-positioned @spell_Q@'s.
Can shrug off tons of damage with a well-timed @spell_E@.
Has the potential to "pop off" in teamfights with @spell_R@'s AoE damage and her True Form.
Synergizes well with @item_6672@, @item_3153@, @item_3124@, @item_3091@, and @item_6333@. Can opt for @item_6673@ or @item_6631@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: On top of being very reliant on gold, she also needs a lot of Takedowns to scale.
Bel'Veth cannot keep chasing enemies in a straight line due to @spell_Q@'s cardinal direction casting, especially if she misses @spell_W@.
@spell_E@ has a longer cooldown of 22 seconds at rank 1. Once used, she is much easier to kill.
@spell_R@'s Void Remora only spawn when Bel'Veth consumes an enhanced Void Coral, which only spawn from Baron and Rift Herald.

insights.value: After two @spell_Q@'s, Vladimir gains 10% bonus movespeed for 0.5 seconds and his next @spell_Q@ within 2.5 seconds deals 85% increased damage and heals more.
Vladimir heals for 15% of the damage dealt by @spell_W@.
If @spell_E@ is charging at the time of @spell_W@'s cast, it can continue charging.
@spell_E@ costs more HP and deals more damage based on its charge time.

strengths.value: Has a strong spike when @spell_Q@ reaches max rank.
Has easy access into teamfights with @spell_W@.
A well-positioned @spell_R@ enables Vladimir to sustain better in teamfights.
Synergizes well with @item_3152@, @item_4629@, @item_4645@, @item_3157@, @item_3089@, and @item_3065@. Can opt for @item_4633@ or @item_4636@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Has a weaker early game.
Immobile, leaving him vulnerable to ganks.
@spell_W@ has a high cooldown of 28 seconds at rank 1. Once used, he can be punished.
@spell_R@'s damage and healing doesn't take place until 4 seconds after the cast.
Most forms of Grievous Wounds hurt Vladimir because of how much healing he has in his kit (@item_3123@, @item_3916@, @item_3011@, @item_3165@, @item_3033@, @item_3075@, @item_6609@).

insights.value: If an enemy is immobilized, Samira can dash to her attack range to auto them. If the enemy is knocked up, she can extend the knock up by 0.5 seconds.
Each @spell_P@ style stack grants Samira 3.5% bonus movespeed, up to 21% at S.
Samira's autos and @spell_Q@'s use her blade at close range for enhanced effects.
Using @spell_Q@ during @spell_E@ deals damage to all enemies in the AoE.
@spell_E@'s cooldown resets on Takedowns.
@spell_R@ can only be cast when @spell_P@'s style stack is at S.

strengths.value: Excels in skirmishes, especially at melee range.
@spell_Q@'s 2 second cooldown at max rank gives her very high DPS on top of @spell_R@'s burst.
Can deny the enemy's engage tools with @spell_W@.
Nimble with @spell_E@, especially during teamfights.
Synergizes well with @item_6673@, @item_3072@, @item_6676@, @item_3031@, and @item_3036@. Can opt for @item_6671@ for more mobility.

weaknesses.value: Has trouble safely entering teamfights.
Struggles against most crowd control.
@spell_W@ has a high cooldown of 30 seconds at rank 1. Once used, she can be punished.
If @spell_E@'s cooldown doesn't reset mid-fight, she's probably dead.

insights.value: If @spell_Q@ hits an enemy, Renata is slowed by 30% for the duration.
@spell_Q@ also stuns hit enemies if the latched target was a champion.
Ally channeling abilities are not interrupted if they "die" with @spell_W@ active.
@spell_R@ forces enemies to attack each other, then Renata's allies, then Renata herself, in that order of priority.

strengths.value: Is an immense threat in teamfights due to @spell_R@.
Can save herself or an ally at any point in the game with a well-timed @spell_W@.
Has the potential to help an ally "pop off" in teamfights with @spell_W@'s reset mechanic.
Synergizes well with @item_2065@, @item_3504@, @item_3107@, @item_6616@, and @item_8001@. Can opt for @item_3190@, @item_4005@, or @item_6617@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Completely immobile, leaving her vulnerable to ganks.
Using @spell_W@ at the wrong time can result in an ally or Renata dying since it'll be on cooldown.
@spell_R@ is actually detrimental if only one enemy is hit.
@spell_R@ has a longer cooldown of 140 seconds at rank 1. Once used, her strength diminishes in fights.

insights.value: @spell_Q@ applies on-hit effects while her autos apply spell effects.
@spell_W@'s wall laser reveals the affected area and will critically strike champions and monsters.
@spell_W@ and @spell_R@ can be cast during @spell_E@, even while riding walls.
@spell_E@ resets Zeri's auto attack and @spell_Q@.
@spell_R@'s passive has no stack limit.

strengths.value: Can set up ganks well with @spell_W@ from behind walls.
Hard to lock down while near walls with @spell_E@'s mobility.
Excels at teamfighting, especially while @spell_R@ is active.
Becomes very nimble after stacking @spell_R@'s passive a few times.
Synergizes well with @item_3508@, @item_6673@, @item_3046@, @item_3085@, and @item_3031@. Can opt for @item_3078@ or @item_6672@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Very reliant on gold and levels.
@spell_Q@ is her main source of damage, but each one is a skillshot. Good positioning is required or it will hurt her.
@spell_W@ has a long cast time, especially at lower attack speed, and has another cast time when it hits a wall.

insights.value: When Annie stuns a target, summons Tibbers, or dies, Tibbers enrages, gaining increased attack speed and movespeed for 3 seconds. It also targets the killer (if in range), or the nearest lowest HP enemy champion.
@spell_P@'s stun with @spell_Q@ is guaranteed since it's a targeted spell.
If @spell_Q@ is disjointed, it will go on cooldown, but not consume @spell_P@'s stacks.
Annie can surprise-stun at 3 stacks by using @spell_E@ during @spell_Q@.
@spell_E@ can be cast on any allied champion and will always affect Tibbers.

strengths.value: Excels at short trades and teamfights.
Has a natural spike in threat every time @spell_P@ is fully stacked.
Has extra protection with @spell_R@ because she can reposition Tibbers to block skillshots.
Synergizes well with @item_6655@, @item_4645@, @item_3157@, @item_3089@, and @item_4637@. Can opt for @item_3152@, @item_6653@, or @item_4636@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Cannot stun more than once per ability rotation, limiting her control in fights.
Immobile, leaving her vulnerable to ganks.
Relies too much on @spell_P@ to fight, and can be punished anytime the stacks are consumed.

insights.value: If an enemy champion has 3 @spell_P@ stacks, @spell_R@ can be used while @spell_Q@ is mid-air to pull them in from a distance.
If @spell_Q@ hits an enemy champion, Tahm Kench is healed for a % of his missing HP.
@spell_Q@ stuns enemy champions if they have 3 @spell_P@ stacks, but the stacks are consumed.
When Tahm Kench uses @spell_R@, he is Grounded and slowed. If the target is an ally, he can still use @spell_W@ and bring his ally along.

strengths.value: Can create his own CC chain on a target with @spell_Q@'s stun into @spell_W@.
Can save an ally in a pinch with @spell_R@ and choose to escape with @spell_W@ when needed.
@spell_R@+@spell_W@ doubles as a flanking tool.
Synergizes well with @item_6662@, @item_3119@, @item_8001@, @item_8020@, @item_3065@, and @item_3143@. Can opt for @item_3068@ for more ramping damage.

weaknesses.value: Has a telegraphed playstyle, making it easier to play around him.
Can be kited very easily by mobile champions or ones who outrange him, especially if he misses @spell_Q@.
Missing the intended target with @spell_W@ can potentially get him killed.
@spell_R@ has a longer cooldown of 120 seconds at rank 1. Once used, his damage and utility in fights are limited.

insights.value: @spell_P@'s effects work on heals and shields from herself and nearby allies.
As Nilah's Crit chance increases, her Armor Penetration, @spell_Q@'s damage, and healing on her auto attacks, @spell_Q@, and @spell_R@ increase.
While @spell_W@ is active, Nilah grants allies she passes through the same effects for a short time.
@spell_E@ resets Nilah's auto attack.
@spell_R@ also slows enemies for each tick of damage it deals.

strengths.value: Has immense synergy with healing and shielding allies.
@spell_Q@'s bonuses are effectively permanent as long as she keeps hitting enemies with it.
Can move around fights especially well with @spell_W@/@spell_E@.
Synergizes well with @item_6673@, @item_3046@, @item_3508@, @item_3031@, @item_6676@, and @item_3072@. Can opt for @item_6671@ for more mobility.

weaknesses.value: Has a weaker early game.
Very reliant on gold and levels.
@spell_W@ has a very long cooldown of 26 seconds at rank 1. Once used, she is much more vulnerable.

insights.value: Kayn can become Shadow Assassin by damaging ranged champions or Rhaast by damaging melee champions.
When Kayn is near enemy champions during @spell_E@, a visual indicator shows up on the wall.
@spell_E@'s duration is reduced to 1.5 seconds if Kayn enters combat with enemy champions. Auto attacking or being hard CC'd ends it.

strengths.value: Spikes upon acquiring a new form.
Rhaast excels at skirmishes and teamfights.
Shadow Assassin excels at finding picks and all-ins.
Chilling Smite can be used to enter a target with @spell_R@ for safety in a pinch.
Rhaast synergizes well with @item_6630@, @item_3071@, @item_3065@, @item_3119@, @item_3074@, and @item_6694@. Can opt for @item_6631@ or @item_6692@ when needed.
Shadow Assassin synergizes well with @item_6691@, @item_3042@, @item_3814@, @item_3142@, @item_6696@, and @item_6694@. Can opt for @item_6693@ or @item_6692@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Is naturally weaker without a form.
Needs to constantly land his skillshots or he'll have significantly lower damage output.
Significantly harder to play from behind.

insights.value: Thresh does not gain armor per level, and instead gains 1 AP/Armor per @spell_P@ soul.
