insights.value: Aphelios has five weapons -- each with a unique attack, @spell_Q@ ability/cooldown, and interaction with @spell_R@.
Aphelios always begins the game with Calibrum and Severum, and has Gravitum, Infernum, and Crescendum queued in reserve. Based on weapon usage, this queue can change.

Instead of ranking up abilities per level up, Aphelios invests those points to increase his Attack Damage, Attack Speed, or Lethality. He automatically gains access to @spell_Q@ at level 2 and @spell_R@ at level 6.
Any @spell_Q@ Aphelios has can be used as long as there is at least 1 ammo left.

strengths.value: When Aphelios syncs two specific weapons for different situations, he can net his team huge advantages. Examples:
With Calibrum and Crescendum, he can place turrets to mark enemies and continuously fire long-ranged attacks at them.
With Severum and Crescendum, he can quickly stack Chakrams to annihilate close-range targets.
With Severum and Infernum, he can tag enemies with Infernum's @spell_Q@ and instantly heal a large amount from Severum's effects.
Synergizes well with @item_6671@, @item_3085@, @item_3031@, @item_3036@, and @item_3072@. Can opt for @item_6673@ or @item_6672@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Forcing Aphelios to exhaust Moonlight to swap weapons diminishes his strength.
Immobile, leaving him vulnerable to ganks.
Weak at level 1 since he only has access to auto attacks until level 2.

insights.value: Shen can be interrupted when casting @spell_R@. Use any hard CC to prevent him from teleporting.

Every time he hits a champ, the CD of his @spell_P@ decreases, allowing him to get multiple shields when dueling.

strengths.value: Lvl 2 is deceptively strong if he lands @spell_E@ on you and casts the 3 @spell_Q@ autos!

weaknesses.value: If he misses @spell_E@ but still uses @spell_Q@, he'll have used up a lot of energy. Abuse that window to fight.
In lane, the best time to trade is when his shield is down. If he uses @spell_Q@ on minions, force a trade as he won't have his shield or empowered autos.

Synergizes well with @item_6653@, @item_3157@, @item_4629@, @item_4637@, and @item_3089@. Can opt for @item_4633@, @item_3152@, @item_4636@, or @item_6617@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Very squishy and struggles against most crowd control.
Significantly harder to play from behind.
Needs to constantly put herself at risk to keep refreshing @spell_Q@'s bonus movespeed.
@spell_W@'s center damage is difficult to land when enemies aren't CC'd.
@spell_R@ has a longer cooldown of 150 seconds at rank 1. Once used, her strength diminishes in fights.

insights.value: Zyra's auto attacks apply a high-priority mark against enemy champions for Thorn Spitters and Vine Lashers to target first.
@spell_P@, @spell_W@, Thorn Spitters, and Vine Lashers reveal their affected areas.
Killing an enemy unit grants 20% charge towards a @spell_W@ Seed, increased to 100% if the enemy is a champion.
Zyra gains True Sight of enemies who step on @spell_W@ for 1.5 seconds.
Thorn Spitters and Vine Lashers within @spell_R@ reset their duration, gain HP, and deal bonus damage.

strengths.value: Very strong laner, and is considered to be a lane bully.
Can sprout Thorn Spitters and Vine Lashers to block skillshots.
Her gank assist and teamfighting become even stronger after unlocking @spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_6653@, @item_4637@, @item_3157@, @item_3116@, @item_4629@, and @item_3089@. Can opt for @item_6617@, @item_6655@, @item_6656@, or @item_4005@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Completely immobile, leaving her vulnerable to ganks.
If her combo is dodged or misses, she's extremely vulnerable and easy to take out.
Significantly harder to play from behind.

insights.value: Kha'Zix can evolve an ability each time he ranks up @spell_R@. @spell_Q@ and his autos gain 50 range, @spell_W@ fires three spikes and slows enemies, @spell_E@ gains range and resets on Takedowns, and @spell_R@ gains a third cast and increases the duration to 2 seconds.
If an Isolated target is hit by evolved @spell_Q@, it refunds 45% of its cooldown.
If an Isolated target is hit by evolved @spell_W@, the slow is increased to 90%.
@spell_W@ also heals Kha'Zix if he's within the explosion's radius.

strengths.value: Excels at finding picks and isolated 1v1's.
Spikes at his evolutions at levels 6, 11, and 16.
When behind, evolving @spell_W@ for wider hits can poke better and help stop sieges.
Synergizes well with @item_6691@, @item_3142@, @item_6696@, @item_3814@, @item_6694@, and @item_3074@. Can opt for @item_6693@ or @item_6692@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Has a deceptive playstyle that involves playing around vision and picking off enemies. If not done right, he's less effective.
Is significantly weaker when enemies aren't Isolated.
@spell_E@ has a longer cooldown of 20 seconds at rank 1. Once used, he can be punished.

insights.value: @spell_P@ and @spell_E@ apply on-hit effects. @spell_R@ also applies them, but at a reduced amount.
@spell_Q@'s Dagger always lands 350 units opposite from where it struck the first target.
Katarina can @spell_E@ to a Dagger's location before it hits the ground. The Dagger won't do anything until it hits the ground though.
@spell_E@ resets Katarina's auto attack.
@spell_R@ applies an empowered Grievous Wounds (40% healing reduction).

strengths.value: Can out-resource most enemies in lane.
Has consistently high burst damage.
Has the potential to "pop off" in teamfights with @spell_P@'s reset mechanic.
Directly counters healing champions with @spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_3152@, @item_3115@, @item_4645@, @item_3089@, @item_3100@, and @item_3074@. Can opt for @item_4636@, @item_4633@, or @item_6672@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Has trouble entering teamfights.
Struggles against most crowd control.
Prone to being zoned in lane, especially if she can't pick up any more Daggers.

insights.value: Ornn can buy any non-consumable item outside of his base with @spell_P@.
During @spell_W@'s cast, Ornn cannot be displaced.
@spell_W@ and both instances of @spell_R@ apply Brittle.
If Ornn collides with terrain during @spell_E@, he knocks up all enemies around him.
@spell_E@ breaks player-made terrain.

strengths.value: @spell_P@'s item upgrades give his team "free gold" and better scaling.
His gank assist and teamfighting become even stronger after unlocking @spell_R@.
A well-positioned @spell_R@ can singlehandedly win teamfights.
Synergizes well with @item_3068@, @item_8020@, @item_3119@, @item_3193@, and @item_3143@. Can opt for @item_6662@ or @item_3001@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Has obvious and telegraphed animations.
Very reliant on gold and levels.
While Ornn is Unstoppable during @spell_W@, he will still be affected by CC afterwards.
@spell_R@ has a longer cooldown of 140 seconds at rank 1. Once used, his strength diminishes in fights.

insights.value: Sett regenerates more HP the lower his HP gets.
His second auto in quick succession comes out faster and deals bonus damage.
@spell_Q@ resets Sett's auto attack.
@spell_W@'s Grit can stack up to 50% of Setts max HP.
If Sett pulls at least one enemy on each side of @spell_E@, it stuns them.
The farther you are from the center of @spell_R@'s AoE, the less damage you'll take, down to 40%.
Sett always ends behind @spell_R@'s grabbed target.

strengths.value: Excels at melee matchups and skirmishes.
It's hard to turret dive Sett because of @spell_W@'s large shield and his fight-turning mechanics.
Has easy backline access with @spell_R@.
A well-positioned @spell_R@ can singlehandedly win a teamfight.
Synergizes well with @item_6630@, @item_3153@, @item_3071@, @item_3053@, @item_6333@, and @item_3748@. Can opt for @item_6631@, @item_6632@, or @item_3078@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Can be kited very easily by mobile champions or ones who outrange him.
@spell_W@ has a longer cooldown of 18 seconds at rank 1. Once used, he can be punished.
Once @spell_R@ is used, Sett has no way out of a fight.

insights.value: When Diana casts a spell, @spell_P@'s bonus attack speed is doubled for 3 seconds.
@spell_Q@ reveals struck enemies.
@spell_W@'s shield is reapplied when all three spheres detonate, and stacks with the original shield.
@spell_E@ resets its cooldown if the target was affected by @spell_Q@.
@spell_R@ deals increased damage for each enemy champion pulled.

strengths.value: Excels at extended trades, especially against immobile champions.
Has a strong level 2-3 all-in with @spell_Q@/@spell_E@. At level 6, she can 100-0 with @spell_R@.
A well-timed @spell_R@ can singlehandedly win teamfights.
Synergizes well with @item_3152@, @item_3115@, @item_4645@, @item_3100@, @item_3157@, and @item_3089@. Can opt for @item_4644@, @item_4633@, @item_6656@, or @item_4636@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: If @spell_E@ is used and its cooldown isn't reset, Diana has no way out of a fight.
Relies too much on @spell_E@'s mobility to fight or set up plays.
@spell_R@ does nothing if it doesn't pull an enemy champion in.

insights.value: @spell_Q@ applies on-hit effects, including @spell_W@.
@spell_W@ resets Fizz's auto attack.
If @spell_W@ kills its target, its cooldown is reduced to 1 second and refunds mana. If not, Fizz deals bonus on-hit damage for 5 seconds.
If @spell_E@ is recast, it has a smaller AoE and doesn't apply a slow.
@spell_R@ deals more damage, applies a stronger slow, and has a larger AoE the farther it travels.

strengths.value: Excels at finding picks and diving turrets.
Has a strong level 2/3 with @spell_W@ for extended trades. At level 6, he can 100-0 with @spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_3152@, @item_4645@, @item_3100@, @item_3157@, @item_3135@, and @item_3089@. Can opt for @item_6655@ or @item_4636@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Significantly harder to play from behind.
@spell_E@ is his escape, waveclear, and trade tool. When used for one, he can't do the others.
If @spell_R@ is dodged, Fizz cannot commit to a full combo.

insights.value: @spell_P@ lasts until broken.
During @spell_W@, Yuumi can redirect @spell_Q@'s trajectory, and @spell_P@/@spell_E@ affect her Anchor instead of herself.
If Yuumi is hard CC'd while dashing with @spell_W@, she is knocked down and @spell_W@ is put on a 5 second cooldown.
Enemies hit by 3 waves of @spell_R@ are rooted for 1.75 seconds.

strengths.value: Excels at enabling carries in fights.
Because of @spell_W@, she doesn't have to purchase boots and can run another combat Summoner Spell instead of Flash.
Her gank assist and teamfighting become much stronger after unlocking @spell_R@.
@spell_R@ doubles as a disengaging tool.
Synergizes well with @item_6617@, @item_3504@, @item_6616@, @item_3107@, @item_3222@, and @item_3089@. Can opt for @item_4005@ or @item_2065@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: If her Anchor dies, she's probably dead too.
Relies far too much on mana.
Significantly harder to play from behind.
Any form of Grievous Wounds hurts Yuumi's team because of how much healing she has in her kit (@item_3076@, @item_3123@, @item_3916@, @item_3011@, @item_3165@, @item_3033@, @item_3075@, @item_6609@).

insights.value: When Sylas has @spell_P@ stacks, he gains 125% bonus attack speed.
@spell_P@'s attacks can be animation-cancelled by any ability.
@spell_W@'s heal is increased up to 100% based on Sylas's missing HP, maxed at 40% HP.
Ultimates stolen by @spell_R@ are held for 90 seconds and are one-time uses.
@spell_R@ cannot be used on the same enemy for 200% of the stolen ultimate's cooldown.

strengths.value: Excels at skirmishes, especially when @spell_W@ is maxed.
Has outplay potential with @spell_E@'s dash and re-engage with the second cast.
Is stronger versus champions with engaging ultimates since he can also use them with @spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_6656@, @item_4629@, @item_3157@, @item_4637@, @item_3102@, and @item_3089@. Can opt for @item_6655@ or @item_4644@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Can be kited very easily by mobile champions or ones who outrange him.
Needs to @spell_R@ the correct ultimate each time to stay effective. One wrong use can hurt him and his team.
Once @spell_E@'s first cast is used, Sylas has no way out of a fight.

insights.value: @spell_Q@'s damage is reduced by 15% per unit hit, down to 40%. This damage modifier resets when the crossblade reaches max range.
@spell_W@ resets Sivir's auto attack.
@spell_W@'s attacks can bounce back to targets once.
Takedowns refresh @spell_R@'s duration, and auto attacks while it's active lower Sivir's basic ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

strengths.value: Has a strong level 2/3 if both instances of @spell_Q@ hit and she resets her auto with @spell_W@.
Has some of the best waveclear in the game with @spell_Q@/@spell_W@.
@spell_R@ doubles as an escape tool.
Synergizes well with @item_6671@, @item_3508@, @item_3046@, @item_3031@, @item_6676@, and @item_3094@. Can opt for @item_6673@ or @item_6672@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: The returning half of @spell_Q@ is easy to dodge since Sivir offers no crowd control.
@spell_E@ has a longer cooldown of 24 seconds at rank 1. Once used, she can be punished.
Forcing Sivir to use @spell_R@ defensively takes away a good chunk of her team's engage.
Less effective in teamfights while @spell_R@ is on cooldown.

insights.value: Each @spell_P@ auto reduces his basic abilities' cooldowns by 1 second and grant 1 charge of @spell_Q@.
@spell_W@ replicates Taric's other abilities, but the effects don't stack.
@spell_W@ grants its bonus armor to the targeted teammate.

strengths.value: Naturally counters diving champions and scales directly with how much Armor he has.
Has a strong level 1-3 with @spell_P@'s auto attacks.
Excels at teamfights and turret dives with @spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_3190@, @item_3119@, @item_3050@, @item_3504@, @item_3109@, and @item_3110@. Can opt for @item_3001@, @item_2065@, or @item_6662@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Completely immobile, leaving him vulnerable to ganks.
@spell_Q@'s mana cost is high and doesn't heal much at low charges.
@spell_E@ is hard to hit due to its short range and channel. Once used, he loses a lot of pressure; especially in lane.
@spell_R@ has a very long cooldown of 180 seconds at rank 1. Once used, he can be punished.

insights.value: From level 6 onwards, @spell_P@ disables wards for a few seconds after being placed, like @item_3364@.
@spell_Q@'s damage is doubled if the target has been recently Feared.
If Fiddlesticks is out of combat and vision, his next ability will fear its target(s). If he pretends to be an Effigy, his next @spell_W@ or @spell_E@ will do the same.
If @spell_W@ isn't interrupted, it refunds 60% of its cooldown.
The center of @spell_E@ also silences enemies.

strengths.value: Can bait important enemy abilities with @spell_P@.
A well-timed @spell_E@ or @spell_R@ can singlehandedly win teamfights.
Can find flanks with @spell_R@ to start ganks and fights.
Synergizes well with @item_3152@, @item_3157@, @item_4645@, @item_4628@, and @item_3089@. Can opt for @item_4644@, @item_6656@, or @item_4636@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: @spell_W@ is only good for damage when targets are low, and enemies can avoid the last tick's damage by simply walking out of the AoE.
Completely immobile (outside of using @spell_R@ to escape).
@spell_R@ has a longer cooldown of 140 seconds at rank 1. Once used, his strength diminishes in fights.

insights.value: @spell_Q@'s split bolts can reach past its max range by casting it at an angle.
@spell_Q@ restores mana per target killed.
@spell_W@ and @spell_E@ reveal their affected areas.
@spell_E@ knocks back hit enemies if cast close to Vel'Koz.
Enemies who are Researched by @spell_P@ take true damage from @spell_R@.

strengths.value: Can find good angles to poke and pick off enemies with @spell_Q@.
At level 6, he can 100-0 with @spell_R@, especially if the enemy laner is Researched.
A well-timed @spell_R@ can singlehandedly win teamfights.
Synergizes well with @item_6655@, @item_3003@, @item_3157@, @item_4645@, @item_3089@, and @item_4628@. Can opt for @item_6653@ or @item_6656@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Completely immobile, leaving him vulnerable to ganks.
Needs to constantly land his skillshots or he'll have significantly lower damage output.
Struggles against enemies who itemize a lot of HP.

insights.value: @spell_P@'s bonuses are also given to a nearby teammate with the highest attack speed.
@spell_Q@ heal is increased by 50% when Nunu & Willump's HP is lower than 50%.
@spell_W@ ramps in movespeed based on his starting movespeed. The higher starting movespeed, the faster it travels.
@spell_W@ cleanses all slows on cast.
@spell_R@'s shield is immediately granted on cast.

strengths.value: Excels at ganks with his CC tools.
Can contest and secure objectives very well with @spell_Q@'s massive true damage.
Can survive and turn fights with @spell_Q@/@spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_3068@, @item_3742@, @item_8020@, @item_4401@, and @item_4637@. Can opt for @item_6662@ or @item_3152@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Can be kited very easily by mobile champions or ones who outrange him.
@spell_W@ and @spell_E@ have cooldowns of 14 seconds at all ranks. Once used, Nunu & Willump's strength diminishes in fights.
Once @spell_W@ is used, Nunu & Willump have no way out of a fight.

localizedInsights.translation: @spell_W@'s cooldown is reduced based on how many @spell_P@ stacks Veigar has.

insights.value: @spell_W@'s cooldown is reduced based on how many @spell_P@ stacks Veigar has.

localizedInsights.translation: @spell_E@ also knocks down enemies who pass through them.

insights.value: @spell_E@ also knocks down enemies who pass through them.

insights.value: @spell_R@ deals up to 100% bonus damage based on the target's missing HP, maxed at 30% HP.

localizedInsights.translation: Going even in lane is good for Veigar because of @spell_P@'s infinitely scaling AP.

strengths.value: Going even in lane is good for Veigar because of @spell_P@'s infinitely scaling AP.

localizedInsights.translation: @spell_E@ doubles as a zoning tool to block enemies off from areas.

strengths.value: @spell_E@ doubles as a zoning tool to block enemies off from areas.

localizedInsights.translation: A well-positioned @spell_E@ can singlehandedly win a teamfight.

strengths.value: A well-positioned @spell_E@ can singlehandedly win a teamfight.

localizedInsights.translation: Synergizes well with @item_6656@, @item_3003@, @item_3157@, @item_4629@, @item_3089@, and @item_3102@. Can opt for @item_4644@ or @item_6655@ when needed.

strengths.value: Synergizes well with @item_6656@, @item_3003@, @item_3157@, @item_4629@, @item_3089@, and @item_3102@. Can opt for @item_4644@ or @item_6655@ when needed.

localizedInsights.translation: Completely immobile, leaving him vulnerable to ganks.

weaknesses.value: Completely immobile, leaving him vulnerable to ganks.

localizedInsights.translation: Struggles against enemies who outrange him.

weaknesses.value: Struggles against enemies who outrange him.

localizedInsights.translation: @spell_E@ has a longer cooldown of 18 seconds at rank 1. Once used, his strength diminishes in fights.

weaknesses.value: @spell_E@ has a longer cooldown of 20 seconds at rank 1. Once used, his strength diminishes in fights.

insights.value: @spell_P@'s first mark always spawns on a Rift Scuttler, unless Kindred earns one through a Takedown beforehand.
@spell_Q@ resets Kindred's auto attack.
@spell_Q@'s cooldown is reduced when Kindred is in @spell_W@'s AoE.
While in @spell_R@'s AoE, if a unit drops to 10% HP, they cannot heal or take damage until @spell_R@'s heal applies.

strengths.value: Has incredible scaling and the option to play aggressively and invade the enemy jungler.
Has major power spikes at 4 and 7 @spell_P@ marks.
Excels at controlling areas in fights and nullifying enemy all-ins.
Synergizes well with @item_6671@, @item_6676@, @item_3095@, @item_3031@, and @item_3072@. Can opt for @item_6673@, @item_6672@, or @item_3078@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Marking an enemy champion takes 8 seconds to set in, signaling them to back off.
Significantly harder to play from behind.
Relies too much on @spell_P@'s marks to get ahead.
Her map movement is predictable since she'll usually go where @spell_P@'s marks are.

insights.value: @spell_Q@'s third cast can travel over walls.
Each @spell_Q@ resets Riven's auto attack.
When Riven uses @spell_E@, she can cast other spells and combo them, ignoring their animations.
Activating @spell_R@ grants 20% bonus AD and 75 increased attack range and @spell_Q@ range.

strengths.value: Can animation cancel @spell_Q@'s with autos to speed up her damage output and increase it with @spell_P@.
Has a strong level 2/3 with @spell_Q@ and @spell_W@ for extended trades. At level 6, she can 100-0 with @spell_R@'s execution damage.
A well-positioned third @spell_Q@ and @spell_R@'s Wind Slash can singlehandedly win a teamfight.
Synergizes well with @item_6630@, @item_3071@, @item_6333@, @item_3074@, @item_3053@, and @item_6694@. Can opt for @item_6631@, @item_6632@, @item_6693@, or @item_3078@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Due to her aggressive playstyle, it can leave her exposed to being ganked and/or flanked.
Extremely high skill champion that requires a lot of well-timed ability casts, animation cancels, and outplays to perform well. One misplay can severely cost her.
Struggles against most crowd control.

insights.value: Galio is Grounded during @spell_W@.
During @spell_W@'s channel time and for two seconds afterwards, Galio takes reduced damage.
If Galio hits an enemy champion during @spell_E@, the dash ends.
@spell_R@ grants @spell_W@'s shield to all allied champions in the AoE on cast.

strengths.value: Naturally counters AP champions with and scales directly with how much MR he has.
His roaming and teamfighting become even stronger after unlocking @spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_6656@, @item_3157@, @item_4628@, @item_8020@, @item_4637@, and @item_3089@. Can opt for @item_3152@, @item_6664@, @item_3001@, or @item_2065@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: @spell_W@ slows Galio down, requiring him to commit other cooldowns to utilize it efficiently.
Once @spell_E@ is used, Galio has no way out of a fight.
@spell_R@ has a very long cooldown of 200 seconds at rank 1.
@spell_R@'s channel can be interrupted by any hard CC, and its AoE is easy to avoid.

insights.value: @spell_Q@ grants True Sight of the struck enemy.
@spell_Q@'s second cast deals up to 100% increased damage based on the enemy's missing HP.
@spell_W@'s cooldown is halved when used on himself or a teammate.
@spell_R@ can be combo'd with Flash, @item_3340@/@item_2055@ + @spell_W@, or @spell_Q@'ing another enemy behind his main target to kick them another direction (aka "Insec").

strengths.value: Excels at ganks and skirmishes.
Has a strong early game and has the option to play aggressively and invade the enemy jungler.
His ganking and teamfighting becomes much stronger after unlocking @spell_R@.
@spell_R@ doubles as a peeling tool.
Synergizes well with @item_6630@, @item_3071@, @item_6333@, @item_3814@, and @item_3053@. Can opt for @item_6693@, @item_6692@, @item_6632@, or @item_3078@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Quickly burns through energy if he doesn't auto between abilities.
Needs a lead to stay ahead, and falls off if he doesn't get one.
Needs @item_2055@'s in his inventory at all times to be more effective with @spell_W@, meaning he cannot complete a 6th item without limiting himself.

insights.value: @spell_W@ grants True Sight of its target.
@spell_E@'s shield lasts 2.5 seconds, but the movespeed only lasts 1.5 seconds.
@spell_R@'s @spell_W@ heals both on cast and when the target is rooted, or if they die beforehand.
@spell_R@'s cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds whenever Karma damages an enemy champion with an ability.

strengths.value: Has strong poke with @spell_Q@, especially when @spell_R@'s @spell_Q@'s second part hits.
Has good gank setup with @spell_E@'s movespeed and @spell_W@'s root.
Can win teamfights with @spell_R@'s @spell_E@'s AoE shield.
Synergizes well with @item_6617@, @item_3504@, @item_6616@, @item_3107@, @item_4629@, and @item_4643@. Can opt for @item_2065@, @item_4005@, or @item_6656@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Immobile, leaving her vulnerable to ganks.
Other than @spell_W@, it's hard to peel enemies.
Needs to use @spell_R@ with the correct ability each time to stay effective. One wrong use can hurt her and her team.

insights.value: @spell_P@ also grants 25% total attack speed and ignores the attack speed cap for the duration.
@spell_Q@'s minigun stacks fall off one at a time instead of all at once.
@spell_W@'s cast time is reduced based on her bonus attack speed.
@spell_E@ also knocks down enemies who pass through them.
@spell_R@ deals less damage if it doesn't travel at least 1500 units, but its % missing HP damage is always dealt in full.

strengths.value: @spell_Q@'s rocket launcher and @spell_W@ offer high range poke in lane.
Can zone flanking enemies and interrupt engages with @spell_E@.
Can swing fights across the map with a well-timed @spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_6672@, @item_3085@, @item_3031@, @item_3046@, @item_3072@, and @item_3074@. Can opt for @item_6671@ or @item_6673@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Immobile, leaving her vulnerable to ganks.
Is often weaker in fights until @spell_P@ procs.
@spell_E@ has a longer cooldown of 24 seconds at rank 1. Once used, she can be punished.

insights.value: @spell_P@'s bonus damage affects turrets.
@spell_Q@'s bounce can critically strike, and is guaranteed to if the first target dies.
@spell_W@'s bonus movespeed is lost if she takes damage.
Hitting a new enemy with @spell_P@ reduces @spell_W@'s cooldown by 2 seconds.
@spell_E@ reveals the affected area.
Each wave of @spell_R@ can critically strike.

strengths.value: Very strong laner, and is considered to be a lane bully.
@spell_E@ doubles as a zoning tool to block enemies off from areas.
A well-timed @spell_R@ can singlehandedly win a fight.
Synergizes well with @item_6672@, @item_6676@, @item_3031@, @item_3036@, and @item_3072@. Can opt for @item_6671@, @item_6673@, or @item_6692@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Immobile, leaving her vulnerable to ganks.
Significantly harder to play from behind.
It's easy to play out of @spell_Q@'s AoE in lane.

insights.value: Graves's autos can hit multiple enemies and can be blocked by other units.
If @spell_Q@ collides with a wall, it returns faster.
@spell_E@'s bonus armor stacks up to 8 times.
@spell_E@ resets Graves's auto attack.
If Graves uses @spell_E@ while reloading, he can cast other abilities mid-dash.

strengths.value: Scales well and has a strong early game. Has the option to play aggressively and invade the enemy jungler.
Has high burst damage with @spell_Q@ and @spell_R@.
A well-placed @spell_W@ can win teamfights.
Synergizes well with @item_6673@, @item_3072@, @item_3031@, @item_3036@, @item_3814@, and @item_3074@. Can opt for @item_6671@, @item_6692@, or @item_6693@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Can be kited very easily by mobile champions.
Struggles against magic damage, as @spell_E@ only grants Armor.
@spell_R@ can be underwhelming in most situations past the mid-game, and is more commonly used for mobility over damage then.

insights.value: Bard can roam and come back to lane without losing much XP because of @spell_P@'s bonus movespeed and XP upon collecting Chimes.
Champions are still targetable inside @spell_E@'s tunnel -- displacements will push them out.
@spell_R@ affects every unit in the game, except Inhibitors and the Nexus.
Using @spell_R@ on a turret as Rift Herald is charging into it will prevent the turret from taking damage.

strengths.value: Excels at roaming and trading, especially with more @spell_P@'s.
Can guarantee @spell_Q@'s stun as @spell_R@'s effect ends.
Can set up ganks by walking out of vision and using @spell_E@ on a wall to gapclose with his ganking teammate.
His gank assist and teamfighting become even stronger after unlocking @spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_2065@, @item_8001@, @item_3107@, @item_4643@, and @item_3742@. Can opt for @item_3190@, @item_3001@, or @item_4005@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: @spell_E@ has a longer cooldown of 22 seconds at rank 1. Once used, he can be punished.
A poorly timed @spell_R@ can spell disaster for his team.
Forcing Bard to use @spell_R@ defensively lowers his teamfighting potential since he'll have less playmaking capabilities.

insights.value: @spell_W@'s bonus armor is tripled while @spell_P@ isn't broken.
@spell_W@ resets Malphite's auto attack.
Enemies hit by @spell_E@ also have their attack speed reduced.
@spell_R@'s speed is increased by Malphite's bonus movespeed.

strengths.value: Naturally counters AD champions and scales directly with how much Armor he has.
@spell_Q@ counters champions with movespeed boosts, taking a chunk of the movespeed for himself.
His gank assist and teamfighting become much stronger after unlocking @spell_R@.
A well-positioned @spell_R@ can singlehandedly win a teamfight.
Synergizes well with @item_6662@, @item_3143@, @item_3119@, @item_3193@, and @item_3110@. Can opt for @item_3068@ or @item_6664@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Struggles against magic damage-heavy compositions.
Immobile (outside of using @spell_R@ to escape), leaving him vulnerable to ganks.
Forcing Malphite to use @spell_R@ defensively lowers his teamfighting potential since he won't have any playmaking capabilities.

insights.value: Ability Haste also reduces the global cooldown on his abilities, letting him change stances more often.
Udyr can upgrade any of his abilities from level 1. At level 11, any ability can be levelled up a 6th time.
Udyr does not retain his abilities' on-hit effects when changing stances.
@spell_W@'s shield stacks with its Awakened shield.

strengths.value: Excels at skirmishes, especially against isolated enemies.
Can counter many scenarios with the proper Awaken effect.
Stunning multiple enemies with Awakened @spell_E@ before swapping to another stance can net his team a sizable advantage.
Can easily stick to enemies with @spell_E@'s bonus movespeed and @spell_R@'s slow.

weaknesses.value: Relies too much on Awakened abilities, and only one ability can be Awakened every so often.
Significantly harder to play from behind.
Awakening the wrong ability can severely lower Udyr's effectiveness in teamfights.
@spell_Q@'s on-hit effects are underwhelming, including its Awakened effects if the enemy isn't isolated.

insights.value: Triggering @spell_P@'s Hunt resets @spell_R@'s cooldown.
@spell_Q@ and @spell_W@ grant True Sight of the hit enemy.
@spell_Q@ deals up to 200% increased damage based on distance traveled.
@spell_E@ heals up to 100% more HP based on the target's missing HP.
Cougar Form's @spell_Q@ deals % missing HP damage and 40% increased damage to Hunted targets.
Cougar Form's @spell_Q@ resets Nidalee's auto attack.
Cougar Form's @spell_W@ can target Hunted enemies from a higher range. Doing this or killing an enemy lowers its cooldown.

strengths.value: Scales well and has a strong early game. Has the option to play aggressively and invade the enemy jungler.
Excels at poking from a safe distance, especially before teamfights.
Synergizes well with @item_4636@, @item_3100@, @item_4645@, @item_3157@, and @item_3089@. Can opt for @item_4633@, @item_6655@, or @item_3152@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Significantly harder to play from behind.
Struggles against champions with mobility.
Needs to constantly land @spell_Q@ or she'll have significantly lower damage output.

insights.value: @spell_Q@'s outer ring applies @spell_P@, deals bonus damage, and heals for 13% missing HP per enemy champion hit, up to 3 champions hit.
@spell_W@ resets Darius's auto attack.
If @spell_R@ kills its target, Darius can recast it for 20 seconds. At max rank, the cooldown is reset instead.

strengths.value: @spell_P@ and @spell_W@ make Darius one of the strongest level 1 champions.
Can survive and outplay ganks/skirmishes with @spell_Q@'s heal.
Can animation cancel @spell_W@'s with other abilities to speed up his damage output.
Has a strong level 2/3 with @spell_W@ and @spell_Q@. At level 6, he can 100-0 with @spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_3078@, @item_3071@, @item_3053@, @item_3742@, @item_3065@, and @item_3748@. Can opt for @item_6631@, @item_6630@, or @item_6632@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Completely immobile, leaving him vulnerable to ganks.
Needs a lead to stay ahead, and falls off if he doesn't get one.
Can be kited very easily by mobile champions or ones who outrange him.
Not effective in teamfights without @spell_P@ and takes too long to stack it.

insights.value: Amumu's autos and @spell_R@ also apply @spell_P@.
@spell_Q@ will follow the struck unit wherever they go, up to 2000 units away.
When Amumu is hit by an auto attack, @spell_E@'s cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
@spell_R@ also knocks down hit enemies.

strengths.value: Excels at teamfighting and locking enemies down with @spell_Q@'s two charges and @spell_R@.
Burns HP bars with @spell_W@, especially against tanks because of its % max HP damage.
Naturally counters AD champions with @spell_E@'s physical damage reduction.
Synergizes well with @item_6662@, @item_4637@, @item_8001@, @item_3193@, and @item_3143@. Can opt for @item_3068@, @item_6656@, @item_6653@, or @item_6664@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Burns through his mana bar very quickly.
Has a weaker early game.
Once both @spell_Q@'s are used, Amumu has no way out of a fight.
@spell_R@ has a longer cooldown of 150 seconds at rank 1. Once used, his strength diminishes.

insights.value: Janna gains 15% bonus healing and shielding power for 5 seconds when she slows or knocks up an enemy champion with an ability.
While @spell_W@ is not on cooldown, Janna gains bonus movespeed.
@spell_E@'s bonus AD persists until the shield expires or breaks.
@spell_E@ can also be cast on turrets.

strengths.value: Proper positioning for @spell_P@ lets teammates play more aggressively.
@spell_Q@'s cast direction is hidden and only unveiled on launch, letting her outplay enemies.
@spell_R@ doubles as a peeling tool with its knockback.
Synergizes well with @item_4005@, @item_3504@, @item_6616@, @item_3107@, and @item_3050@. Can opt for @item_6617@ or @item_2065@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Immobile, leaving her vulnerable to ganks. This is especially true when @spell_W@ is on cooldown.
@spell_E@ is easier to deal with since the shield decays over time.
@spell_R@ has a longer cooldown of 150 seconds at rank 1. Once used, her strength diminishes in fights.

insights.value: While below 50% HP, @spell_P@ heals for the same amount of damage dealt, increased to 250% while below 25% HP.
Holding @spell_Q@ will follow the targeted unit wherever they go (excluding Recalls).
@spell_W@'s cooldown reduces twice as fast while no enemies are being Blood Hunted.
@spell_R@'s range is increased by Warwick's average movespeed in the last 2.5 seconds.

strengths.value: Excels at extended trades and skirmishes.
His ganking and teamfighting become much stronger after unlocking @spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_6632@, @item_3748@, @item_3153@, @item_3053@, @item_3065@, and @item_6333@. Can opt for @item_6631@, @item_3068@, @item_6664@, or @item_6630@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: @spell_W@ has an extremely long cooldown of 120 seconds at rank 1. Once used, he cannot gank as effectively.
Missing the intended target with @spell_R@ can potentially get him killed.
Once @spell_R@ is used, Warwick has no way out of a fight.
Directly countered by anyone who purchased @item_3140@.
Any form of Grievous Wounds hurts Warwick because of how much healing he has in his kit (@item_3076@, @item_3123@, @item_3916@, @item_3011@, @item_3165@, @item_3033@, @item_3075@, @item_6609@).

insights.value: @spell_W@ can be timed to ignore a displacement ability.
@spell_W@'s cooldown resets on Takedowns and when detonating @spell_E@ at max stacks.
When used on turrets, @spell_E@'s explosion radius is doubled.
@spell_R@ can be used during @spell_W@ to push enemies into her team.

strengths.value: Has the potential to "pop off" in teamfights with @spell_W@'s reset mechanic.
Has a very strong level 2/3 with @spell_W@ and @spell_E@.
Her gank assist and teamfighting become much stronger after unlocking @spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_6671@, @item_3046@, @item_3031@, @item_3095@, @item_3094@, and @item_3072@. Can opt for @item_6672@ or @item_6673@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: If she can't reset @spell_W@ after going in, she's probably dead.
@spell_E@ will naturally push the wave, leaving her wave in bad spots.
When pushed under turret, @spell_E@ makes it harder to CS.

insights.value: Each @spell_P@ attack reduces @spell_E@'s cooldown by 1 second, increased to 2 seconds against champions.
@spell_Q@ damages all enemies caught in its AoE.
Ally buffs cause Lucian's next two autos to deal bonus damage. An ally triggering @spell_W@'s movespeed buff counts towards this.
@spell_W@ reveals the affected area.
@spell_E@ resets Lucian's auto attack.
@spell_R@'s direction can't be changed after cast, but @spell_E@ can be used to reposition.

strengths.value: Full combos deal devastating damage to single targets.
Has a strong level 2, as he can proc @spell_P@ twice with two abilities in quick succession.
Chases down targets well with @spell_W@'s bonus movespeed and @spell_E@.
Synergizes well with @item_6672@, @item_3508@, @item_6675@, @item_3031@, and @item_3072@. Can opt for @item_6671@ or @item_6673@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Has a very short attack range of 500, which can be punished.
Needs a lead to stay ahead, and falls off if he doesn't get one.
@spell_R@ needs most of its shots to hit one target to be effective, especially early on.

insights.value: Brand restores mana each time he kills a unit affected by @spell_P@.
When Brand hits a target affected by @spell_P@ with another ability, @spell_Q@ stuns, @spell_W@ deals 25% bonus damage, and @spell_E@'s spread range is doubled.
@spell_R@ prioritizes its next target by checking for who has the most @spell_P@ stacks.
@spell_R@ also bounces back to Brand if no other enemy champions are nearby.

strengths.value: Excels at skirmishes and teamfights, especially when enemies are close to each other.
Has a strong level 3 with @spell_Q@/@spell_W@/@spell_E@ to proc @spell_P@.
Has strong waveclear with @spell_E@ + @spell_W@.
Synergizes well with @item_6653@, @item_4637@, @item_3116@, @item_4629@, and @item_3157@. Can opt for @item_6655@ or @item_4636@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Completely immobile, leaving him vulnerable to ganks.
His damage is tied to his abilities. Once used, his strength diminishes.
Enemies can stop @spell_R@ from bouncing by simply walking away from each other.

insights.value: If @spell_Q@ hits terrain, it refunds 50% of its cooldown and mana cost and drags him the full distance.
@spell_W@ resets Nautilus's auto attack.
@spell_E@ can hit the same target again (and again) for half damage.
@spell_R@ also hits enemies along the way, but take reduced damage.

strengths.value: Has great gank setup with @spell_P@ and @spell_Q@.
Is a major threat at any point in the game when @spell_R@ is available.
Can force teamfights by simply using @spell_R@.
Synergizes well with @item_3001@, @item_3050@, @item_3109@, @item_8020@, and @item_4643@. Can opt for @item_3190@, @item_6664@, @item_2065@, or @item_4005@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Significantly harder to play from behind.
If @spell_Q@ lands and he can't immediately walk away after using @spell_P@, he's probably dead.
@spell_R@ has a longer cooldown of 120 seconds at level 1. Once used, he is less effective.

insights.value: If Volibear is hard-CC'd during @spell_Q@, it ends prematurely and resets its cooldown.
@spell_Q@ resets Volibear's auto attack.
@spell_W@ applies Wounded to its target. If cast on a Wounded enemy, it deals 50% increased damage and heals him based on his missing HP. This healing is halved vs. minions.
@spell_W@ applies on-hit effects, including @spell_P@.
@spell_R@ also damages and temporarily disables turrets.

strengths.value: Excels at extended trades/fights and setting up turret dives.
@spell_Q@'s stun is long enough to land @spell_E@/@spell_R@.
@spell_E@'s cast animation can be hidden by attacking or using other abilities.
Synergizes well with @item_6632@, @item_3053@, @item_3742@, @item_3065@, @item_3748@, and @item_3071@. Can opt for  @item_6631@, @item_3078@, @item_6662@, @item_6664@, or @item_3068@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Can be kited very easily by mobile champions or ones who outrange him.
Needs a lead to stay ahead, and falls off it he doesn't get one.
@spell_R@ is telegraphed and slow.
Needs to cast @spell_W@ at least twice to have successful trades and fights.

insights.value: @spell_P@'s bolts fire from whoever she casts @spell_E@ on for the duration.
Hitting an enemy with both @spell_Q@ bolts deals 25% increased damage.
Enemies hit by @spell_W@ also have their base movespeed reduced by 60.
@spell_E@ grants True Sight of the hit enemy.
Enemies near a teammate affected by @spell_R@ are slowed.

strengths.value: Excels at disrupting enemy divers with @spell_W@/@spell_R@.
Can @spell_Q@ enemies from an increased distance by moving Pix to another unit with @spell_E@.
Synergizes well with @item_2065@, @item_6616@, @item_3504@, @item_3107@, and @item_4643@. Can opt for @item_6617@ or @item_4005@ when needed.

weaknesses.value: Immobile, leaving her vulnerable to ganks.
@spell_W@ is an enchanting and peeling tool. When used for one, she can't do the other.
Forcing Lulu to use @spell_R@ early lowers her peeling potential.
